function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integrated and proactive strategic planning for disaster recovery in smart cities","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to the spread of contagious diseases and inability to effectively recover from disasters","Mitigation":"Implementing integrated and holistic strategic planning processes with vertical and horizontal alignment approaches","Technologies":"ICTs (Information and Communication Technologies)","People":"City populations, especially in smart cities","Owner":"City governments and disaster agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient research and development in smart city frameworks for disaster recovery","Impact":"Limited understanding and preparedness for managing contagious disease outbreaks and other disasters","Mitigation":"Increased research and critical debate to improve the resilience of cities, with a focus on economic and social recovery","Technologies":"ICTs (Information and Communication Technologies)","People":"Researchers, city governments, disaster agencies","Owner":"Researchers, city governments, disaster agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of use of emerging technologies in smart city frameworks for health pandemics and disaster recovery","Impact":"Inability to effectively face and recover from health pandemics and other disasters","Mitigation":"Integration of emerging technologies (ETs) in smart city frameworks to improve disaster response and recovery","Technologies":"Emerging technologies (ETs), ICTs (Information and Communication Technologies)","People":"City governments, disaster agencies, technology developers","Owner":"City governments, disaster agencies"}]}
